attributes.action: Challenge the legitimacy of the 'Leave' campaign following the EU referendum
attributes.additional_details: Following the result it was clear that many leave voters felt betrayed by the false claims and would have made a different choice on 23rd June
attributes.background: During the EU referendum the Leave Campaign made claims to the general public that were proven to be inaccurate and untrue by official agencies, such as £350 million a week being sent to the EU. Following the result leave campaigners admitted on national TV that the 350million figure was not correct

rejection.details:
If you want a public inquiry into claims made during the referendum campaign, you could sign this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/139525
